sentences: Kurt Robert Neumann (born October 9, 1961) is an American singer, guitarist, and songwriter.
Neumann co-founded BoDeans in Wisconsin in the 1980s.
In 1997, Neumann recorded a cover of Bruce Springsteen's "Atlantic City" for the compilation One Step Up/Two Steps Back: The Songs of Bruce Springsteen.
In 2000, Neumann released a solo album entitled Shy Dog.
